dublin_core.dcvalue: The past decade has seen an explosion in the use of computers data programs hand held electronic devices and the Internet How these advances impact on haemophilia management both now and in the future are discussed from the perspective of haemophilia registries Internet based electronic haemophilia treatment records and the potential for haemophilia telehealth
Haemophilia : the official journal of the World Federation of Hemophilia
The impact of information technology on haemophilia care.
